Sorry, we weren\'t able to add trip protection. Please try again or continue booking without trip protection.

1. Your ticket is non-refundable and you\'re too sick to travel.

2. You get injured and can\'t make your flight home.

3. Your traveling companion has a covered medical emergency and can\'t travel.

1. Your ticket is non-refundable and you\'re too sick to travel.

2. You need to replace lost baggage, including laptop, phone, or camera.

3. Your insurance may not cover medical expenses while traveling.
3 reasons why you might need trip protection
